title: Spectrum: Self-driving carnage
description: Drive into a child, or swerve and hit two grandparents? Such horrendously difficult choices will soon be programmed into ours cars. Cast your own vote in this moral bloodbath of an episode.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Podcast, Spectrum, Wissen & Umwelt, Auto, Mobilität
